actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill providing for an emergency off-system bridge replacement program.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to provide for an emergency off-system bridge replacement program for toll-free roads in rural areas which is not on any Federal aid system road. Authorizes the appropriation of funds for such purpose for the fiscal years 1976-1980.

titles.title: A bill providing for an emergency off-system bridge replacement program.
